1.title: Introduction

episode of.title: Tales from the Tub: Diary of an Independent Filmmaker (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: A filmmaker's projects, vlog and current IndieGoGo fundraising campaign.

2.title: Meet the Producer

episode of.title: Tales from the Tub: Diary of an Independent Filmmaker (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Producer Kenhalo Bernet talks about being French, her passion for producing, and current and future film projects.

3.title: Meet the Production Designer

episode of.title: Tales from the Tub: Diary of an Independent Filmmaker (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: Tad introduces production designer, Amy Ralph, who talks about her job as a production designer, and about the main character of their film project No Love Lost (2012).

4.title: Meet the Makeup & Effects Artist

episode of.title: Tales from the Tub: Diary of an Independent Filmmaker (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: Special effects artist, Brian Kinney shares some Hollywood gossip and speaks about his plans for future A. Tad Chamberlain projects.

5.title: Meet Actor James Evans

episode of.title: Tales from the Tub: Diary of an Independent Filmmaker (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: Tad introduces actor James Evans, the man who plays a mailman in all his films.

6.title: Meet the VFX Supervisor

episode of.title: Tales from the Tub: Diary of an Independent Filmmaker (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Tad introduces a Visual Effects Supervisor, whose identity must be kept secret.

7.title: Meet Actor Michael Q. Schmidt

episode of.title: Tales from the Tub: Diary of an Independent Filmmaker (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: Tad introduces Michael Q. Schmidt, a popular crazy naked actor extraordinaire who is admired for his unforgettable and show-stealing role as "Slave Jim" in Tad's film Anti-Samaritan Hotline (2010).

8.title: And... We're Back!

episode of.title: Tales from the Tub: Diary of an Independent Filmmaker (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: In this episode Tad welcomes you back to "Tales from the Tub" after a six-month hiatus.

9.title: Meet Cinematographer Anthony C. Kuhnz

episode of.title: Tales from the Tub: Diary of an Independent Filmmaker (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: Tad introduces cinematographer Anthony C. Kuhnz.

imdb.plot outline: TALES FROM THE TUB is brought to you by me, writer-director A. Tad Chamberlain, live from my bathtub! Over the years, my tub has been the site of many of my best creative brainstorming sessions (which I like to refer to as "brainshowers") and now I am pleased to share this special creative space with YOU. Each episode will chronicle the progress on my film projects, giving you glimpses behind the scenes, as well as introducing you to some of my collaborators as we talk about the process of working together to make movie magic (or something like that). Whenever possible, I'll do my best to get them INTO THE TUB for our candid conversations! All music is provided courtesy of my brother, Camden Ray Chamberlain, who scores all my films.
imdb.title: Tales from the Tub: Diary of an Independent Filmmaker
akas: Tales from the Tub: Diary of an Independent Filmmaker (United States)
plot: 'A. Tad Chamberlain' (qv) reveals his "brainshowers", speaks about financing his projects, and interviews cast and crew of his productions.::A Tad Chamberlain

TALES FROM THE TUB is brought to you by me, writer-director 'A. Tad Chamberlain' (qv), live from my bathtub! Over the years, my tub has been the site of many of my best creative brainstorming sessions (which I like to refer to as "brainshowers") and now I am pleased to share this special creative space with YOU. Each episode will chronicle the progress on my film projects, giving you glimpses behind the scenes, as well as introducing you to some of my collaborators as we talk about the process of working together to make movie magic (or something like that). Whenever possible, I'll do my best to get them INTO THE TUB for our candid conversations! All music is provided courtesy of my brother, 'Camden Ray Chamberlain' (qv), who scores all my films.::A Tad Chamberlain
